title: lf a Top/Jungle
body:
▬▬ι═══════ﺤTeam Manic-═══════ι▬▬

I've been looking to create a competitive LoL team with the hopes of improving individual + team skills, participating in tournaments, and just climbing the ranked ladder as far as possible as a strong team.Once the roster is finalized, a schedule will be created accordingly to accommodate everyone's IRL schedules. I'll go more in-depth with details with the finalized team about this but I expect all players to attend practises on time.
due to people not reading before messaging when you message me type lets win in my pm

▬▬ι═══════ﺤ POSITIONS -═══════ι▬▬

Coach - Pew
Analyst - Open (pm Tmc pjc if interested)
Team Captain - Tmc pjc (subject to change)
Shot caller (Tmc Pjc) (subject to change)
Subs - Open (pm Tmc Pjc if interested)
Top Laner - O P E N
Mid Laner - Frosted Stars
ADC - Tmc Pjc
Support - Scythe Senpai
Jungler - still open

▬▬ι═══════ﺤ REQUIREMENTS -═══════ι▬▬

Gold+ SoloQ Ranking (Exceptions to this may be given depending on a number of factors)
Positive Attitude & Mindset
Must be mature
Computer capable of running League of Legends smoothly
Some form of communication program such as Teamspeak (We'll find a universal one that everyone has access too)
Be able to be present for scheduled times (Schedule will be made once we have a full roster + everything settled)

▬▬ι═══════ﺤ APPLICATION FORMAT -═══════ι▬▬

(Don't forget to add me on LoL (smashed wings) once you've posted your application for further screening. Applicants that make it past the first screening will be put onto a temporary team and will under go even more screening via in game before finally being put into the final team.)

IGN :
Age :
Timezone :
SoloQ Rank :
Position you're applying for :
Main Role :
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) :
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) :
Strengths :
Weaknesses :
Why do you want to be a part of this team :

replies.body:
IGN : ViV Yuuma
Age : 18
Timezone : EST
SoloQ Rank : Gold 5
Position you're applying for : Top
Main Role : Top
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : Renekton,Riven,Gnar,Moak,Nasus,Liss,Irelia,Rumble
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : Yes, i do 5s and 3s tournaments with EVG
Strengths : CS Heavy/Ward Control/Warding
Weaknesses : Greedy when ahead by alot
Why do you want to be a part of this team : Want to get better at the game, win stuff at tournys and also work with a team
Hit me up, i'll play top bruh :D I was d2 last season. IGN: Von7

IGN : ProphetHunter
Age : 19
Timezone : PST
SoloQ Rank : Plat 3
Position you're applying for : Top
Main Role : ADC
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : Lissandra, Rumble, Ireila, Gnar, Maokai, Sion,
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : 4-5 season tourmaents of League of Legends, some cod touraments
Strengths : can pick up new champs with ease, laning, good use of teleport
Weaknesses : communication, working with ganks, avoiding ganks,
Why do you want to be a part of this team : I love the ranked 5s atomsphere and if the team is good enough i will work hard enough to be the best in the role i am in.

IGN : TheRealSlimNatey
Age : 27
Timezone : EST
SoloQ Rank : Plat 4
Position you're applying for : Top
Main Role : Top
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : Irelia, Sion, Trundle, Maokai, Nasus, Warwick, Mundo, Diana, RekSai, Zac, Jax, Vi, Rumble
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : yes, played a couple small LoL tourneys
Strengths : laning, game knowledge, large champ pool
Weaknesses : communication
Why do you want to be a part of this team : more fun than solo Q

IGN : Marth Lowell
Age :22
Timezone : 15:55
SoloQ Rank : Unranked atm was plat V last season
Position you're applying for : Top/Jungle
Main Role : Top
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : Irelia/shyvanna/Lissandra/kassadin/Gank PLank/Maokai
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : Yes, I`ve played in at least 5 presential tournaments
Strengths : I consider myself a dominant top laner and strong at team fights.
Weaknesses : Desicion making.
Why do you want to be a part of this team : Im a main toplaner looking for a long term team

IGN : youngfishfillet
Age : 19
Timezone : central
SoloQ Rank : s2
Position you're applying for : top or jg
Main Role : jg
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : top champs would be vi, sej, kha, hec, mao, j4. No specific order
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : played one tourney this season and won. playing in another this saturday
Strengths : i communicate very well, map awareness, shot calling
Weaknesses : over committing in some in fights (as in can be a little aggressive)
Why do you want to be a part of this team : to grow as a player individually and be a part of a team that wants to as well

IGN :Cullens
Age :23
Timezone :EST
SoloQ Rank : was gold last season haven't played yet this season
Position you're applying for : jg
Main Role : jg or mid
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) : kha, maokai, morgana (yes i can jungle morgana), trundle, after that i have just recently picked up j4, but i plan on adding many more
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : none
Strengths : map awareness, counter building, willing to do whats best for the team
Weaknesses : overcommiting on some fights, trying to do a little too much
Why do you want to be a part of this team : Want to be a part of a well organized team that will stick together and climb the ladder

IGN :Rike

Age :19

Timezone :Pacific

SoloQ Rank :Plat 4

Position you're applying for :Top

Main Role :Top/Mid

Champion pool (In order from best to worst) :Gnar, Annie, Jayce, Nasus, Jarvan, Wukong, Riven, Chogath, Rumle, Azir , Jax, Kennen, Karthus, Lissandra, Fizz

Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) :N/A

Strengths :Good split pusher, Past experience on a Plat 5 ranked 5s team(playing against plat and D+ players), Good TP usage, Not afraid to be aggressive

Weaknesses : Sometimes lack vision around my lane(currently working on this), Struggle when playing from behind at times but not too often.

Why do you want to be a part of this team :Team seems to be pretty well organized and I want to play with players that actually want to climb the Ranked 5s ladder, practice, and committed to put in effort for the team.

Just noticed your name change btw, so I copy pasted this from your other post :D

IGN :GGeist
Age :24
Timezone :PST
SoloQ Rank : Gold II
Position you're applying for : Top/Support
Main Role : Top 
Champion pool (In order from best to worst) :Gnar / Liss / Kennen/ Irelia, Janna/Thresh/Sona/Soraka
Any past experience playing in tournaments? (Not limited to League only, if yes please elaborate) : none
Strengths : Experienced, mained every role at some point, shotcalling experience
Weaknesses : Time, average mechanics
Why do you want to be a part of this team : Looking for a new team, never had the opportunity to play with fellow tryhards :3
